title: LF , WTB : This Exact Teddy Pose Postcard
author: MikeGarcia

posts.post_title: LF , WTB : This Exact Teddy Pose Postcard
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://imagehost.vendio.com/a/2042957/view/1941TEDDYTRYAGAIN_NEW.JPG[/IMG]


...
....This is a cereal premium , a 5 x 7 thick-stock glossy photo from the Jack Armstrong ( "The All-American Boy" ) radio program circa 1940 or 1941 , sponsored by Gold Medal Foods' Wheaties cereal. You had to send in for the set , consisting of eight pictures of the biggest current names in American sports ( five baseball players , one woman
golfer , and two big names from mid-west football )...........I'm told that this exact pose is available on a postcard , or at least a postcard-sized photo , but I'm not finding any ;....Do any of you have one ?..Does such a RPPC actually exist , have you seen one  ? --I would appreciate any leads on where one might be for sale or trade. Thanks.....( P S .....it might not be the exact same white ink  signature or on that exact same spot....)....Thanks for any help , guys
.
.

..
